Name: data_rv
Description: Primary data container for uploaded metadata and counts. Reset on new session or file upload.
Used By: editableTableServer, linkedTableServer, PCA analysis, session save/restore

Name: counts_rv
Description: Working count matrix. Synced from data_rv on upload. Columns match metadata labels.
Used By: linkedTableServer, PCA analysis, violin plots, annotation

Name: pca_rv
Description: Stores PCA results including VST object, scores, variance explained. Reset on new file upload.
Used By: PCA plot, scree plot, VST violin plots, eigenvalue/score exports, heatmap, top genes

Name: meta_out
Description: Bridge reactive to expose edited metadata from editableTableServer module.

Name: annotation_rv
Description: Stores gene annotation data from g:Profiler or GTF file. Includes gene_name, description, coordinates.
Used By: Annotation table, top genes table, heatmap, session save/restore

Name: get_current_metadata
Description: Helper that accesses editableTableServer output. Creates proper reactive dependency for consumers.
Used By: PCA run handler, PCA plot, PCA exports, email summary, global save, violin plots

Name: top_loading_genes
Description: Top N loading genes for selected PC with direction filter. Includes annotations if available. Has attributes: pc_name, var_explained.

Name: heatmap_top_genes
Description: Top N loading genes for heatmap (separate from table). Uses absolute loadings. Has attributes: pc_name, var_explained.

Name: current_data
Description: Current state of editable metadata table. Updated by edits, deletes, resets.
Used By: Table render, undo, reset, download, parent scope via module return

Name: deleted_stack
Description: Stack of deleted rows for undo functionality. LIFO structure.

Name: dynamic_data
Description: Count matrix filtered to match current metadata labels. Auto-updates when samples change.
Used By: Count table render, violin plots, download

Name: storage
Description: Session management functions for save/restore functionality.

Name: email
Description: Email notification batching and sending.
Used By: All edit handlers, file upload, example data load

Name: sartools_base_colors
Description: Extended color palette for group coloring in violin/box plots. 12 distinct colors.

Name: get_group_colors
Description: Generates colors for any number of groups. Uses base colors â‰¤12, interpolates for >12.

Name: theme_qc
Description: Custom ggplot2 theme with light background (#fafafa), clean styling.

Name: output$file_uploaded
Description: Flag for conditional panel visibility. TRUE when data_rv$meta is not NULL.

Name: output$pca_computed
Description: Flag for PCA results visibility. TRUE when pca_rv$computed is TRUE.
Used By: PCA results panel, VST violin tabs, loading/heatmap tabs

Name: output$annotation_ready
Description: Flag for annotation results visibility. TRUE when annotation_rv$ready is TRUE.

Name: output$annotation_source_badge
Description: Badge showing annotation source (g:Profiler blue, GTF green).

Name: output$annotation_table
Description: Interactive table of annotated genes with gene_id, ensembl_id, gene_name, description, coordinates.

Name: output$pca_plot
Description: Interactive PCA score plot with customizable colors, size, opacity, background.

Name: output$pca_scree
Description: Scree plot showing variance explained per PC with cumulative line.

Name: output$pca_summary
Description: Summary statistics of PCA: variance explained, standard deviations per PC.

Name: output$pca_color_ui
Description: Dynamic color-by selector populated with current metadata columns.

Name: output$heatmap_color_ui
Description: Dynamic color-by selector for heatmap annotation bar, populated with metadata columns.

Name: output$loading_table
Description: Interactive table of top loading genes with Rank, Gene, Gene_Name, Description, coordinates, Loading.

Name: output$topgenes_heatmap
Description: Interactive heatmap of VST expression for top loading genes. Includes sample clustering and annotation.

Name: output$boxplot_raw
Description: Static violin+box plot of raw counts (log2+1) colored by group.

Name: output$boxplot_vst
Description: Static violin+box plot of VST counts colored by group. Requires PCA completion.

Name: output$boxplot_vst_ui
Description: Conditional UI that shows VST plot or message to run PCA first.

Name: output$comparison_plot
Description: Side-by-side faceted comparison of raw vs VST distributions.

Name: output$comparison_ui
Description: Conditional UI that shows comparison plot or message to run PCA first.

Name: output$download_pca_plot
Description: Exports PCA plot with current customization options and proper margins.

Name: output$download_eigenvalues
Description: Exports eigenvalues, standard deviations, variance explained, cumulative variance.

Name: output$download_pca_scores
Description: Exports PCA scores (all PCs) joined with current metadata.

Name: output$download_annotations
Description: Exports full annotated counts matrix with gene annotations.

Name: output$download_top_genes
Description: Exports top loading genes with metadata, coordinates, and variance explained.

Name: input$annotation_method
Description: Annotation method: "gprofiler" or "gtf".

Name: input$annotation_organism
Description: Organism for g:Profiler (hsapiens, mmusculus, etc.).

Name: input$annotation_source
Description: ID type for g:Profiler (ENSG, ENST, ENTREZGENE_ACC, HGNC).

Name: input$run_annotation
Description: Triggers g:Profiler annotation with current parameters.

Name: input$gtf_file
Description: GTF file upload for local annotation parsing.

Name: input$gtf_gene_id_attr
Description: GTF attribute name for gene ID extraction (default: gene_id).

Name: input$run_gtf_annotation
Description: Triggers GTF file parsing for annotation.

Name: input$clear_annotations
Description: Clears current annotation data.

Name: input$topgenes_pc
Description: PC selection for top genes table (1-10).

Name: input$topgenes_n
Description: Number of top genes to show (10-500, default 50).

Name: input$topgenes_direction
Description: Loading direction filter: "both", "positive", "negative".

Name: input$heatmap_pc
Description: PC selection for heatmap (1-10).

Name: input$heatmap_n_genes
Description: Number of genes for heatmap (10-100, default 30).

Name: input$heatmap_color_by
Description: Metadata column for heatmap annotation bar.

Name: input$heatmap_cluster_rows
Description: Cluster genes (rows) in heatmap.

Name: input$heatmap_cluster_cols
Description: Cluster samples (columns) in heatmap.

Name: input$heatmap_dist_method
Description: Distance method for clustering (euclidean, correlation, etc.).

Name: input$heatmap_clust_method
Description: Clustering method (complete, average, ward.D2, etc.).

Name: input$heatmap_show_dendro
Description: Show dendrogram on heatmap.

Name: input$heatmap_scale_rows
Description: Z-score scale rows (genes) in heatmap.

Name: input$heatmap_show_rownames
Description: Show gene names on heatmap rows.

Name: input$heatmap_show_colnames
Description: Show sample names on heatmap columns.

Name: input$heatmap_colors
Description: Color palette for heatmap (RdYlBu, RdBu, viridis, etc.).

Name: input$load_session
Description: Loads existing session by ID from session_id_input.

Name: input$start_new
Description: Opens confirmation modal for new session.

Name: input$confirm_new_session
Description: Confirms new session, resets all data and creates new session ID.

Name: input$load_example
Description: Loads Example_Data.RData from server, creates new session.

Name: input$file
Description: Accepts .RData file upload containing metadata and counts (up to 3GB).

Name: input$run_pca
Description: Triggers DESeq2 VST and PCA computation with current parameters.

Name: input$pca_pc_x
Description: X-axis PC selection (1-10+).

Name: input$pca_pc_y
Description: Y-axis PC selection (1-10+).

Name: input$pca_color_by
Description: Metadata column for point coloring.

Name: input$vst_blind
Description: Blind mode for VST (ignore sample info).

Name: input$vst_fitType
Description: Dispersion fit type (parametric/local/mean).

Name: input$pca_ntop
Description: Number of top variable genes for PCA.

Name: input$plot_title
Description: Custom title for PCA plot.

Name: input$plot_point_size
Description: Point size for PCA scatter.

Name: input$plot_point_opacity
Description: Point opacity (0-1).

Name: input$gradient_color1
Description: Start color for group gradient (#636EFA default).

Name: input$gradient_color2
Description: Middle color for group gradient (#EF553B default).

Name: input$gradient_color3
Description: End color for group gradient (#00CC96 default).

Name: input$plot_show_grid
Description: Show/hide plot grid lines.

Name: input$plot_show_legend
Description: Show/hide color legend.

Name: input$plot_bg_color
Description: Plot background color preset.

Name: input$reset_plot_options
Description: Resets all plot options to defaults.

Name: input$open_download_modal
Description: Opens plot download configuration modal.

Name: input$plot_download_format
Description: Export format (png/pdf/svg/html).

Name: input$plot_download_width
Description: Export width in pixels.

Name: input$plot_download_height
Description: Export height in pixels.

Name: input$plot_download_filename
Description: Custom filename for export.

Name: input$save_now_global
Description: Manual session save button.

Name: input$session_id_input
Description: Session ID input for restoring previous sessions.
